name: UI/UX Designer
description:
As a OccamFi UI/UX Designer, you will be responsible for ensuring that the OccamFi website is a top tier experienceYou will rethink UX flows, put together designs for our website, and design new features, working closely with the product and engineering teams.

The UX/UI Designer Position

This job will require you to work across UX and UI, across the web, and with a few different engineering teams on large and small projects. If you’re a specialist in some particular area of design, we’d love to hear about that.

Primary Responsibilities

  • Evolve, explore and apply our visual identity; become fully immersed in the OccamFi's brand and mission,

  • Work on multiple digital projects simultaneously in a fast-paced, ever-changing environment,

  • Generate clear ideas, concepts and designs of creative assets from beginning to end,

  • Execute and produce a mix of graphic, motion, and photographic content,

  • Collaborate with a cross-functional team that includes marketing, engineers, and product managers in order to create compelling content for the user and to deliver high quality product experiences,

  • Distill and visualize complex data sets and attributes into digestible views,

  • Support multiple business lines with creation of digital assets,

  • Distill and visualize complex data sets and attributes into digestible views,

  • Work closely with the marketing partners to formulate, communicate and transform a complex system into a simplistic message,

  • Explore new directions and design patterns to meet the requirements while pushing the quality of design forward,

  • Oversees the execution of assets, logos, icons and interfaces for multiple platforms,

  • Help with leading efforts to develop ad campaigns and design styles for product launches, features updates, and ad campaigns,

  • Develop new designs as well as iterate on existing designs for the website,

  • Work with marketing to design content, for example white papers.

Basic Requirements

  • 3+ years of digital design working experience,

  • 2+ years of experience in UX or Product design discipline,

  • Exposure to / interest in the cryptocurrency space,

  • Proficient in Sketch, Figma, Adobe CC, Adobe Photoshop,

  • Solid understanding of user-centered design and UX/UI principles,

  • Experience of working on agile environment,

  • Design fundamentalist knowing the rules, but knows how to bend and break them to create innovative solutions,

  • Strong communication skills to articulate concepts and design to a variety of key stakeholders,

  • Knowledge for interpreting user research data and site analytics to make data-informed design decisions,

  • Ability to problem solve complex concepts with multiple simplistic concepts,

  • Advanced problem-solving skills to align agreement with cross-functional teams,

  • Creative mindset and ability to adapt to change,

  • Able to accomplish their given work quickly and thoughtfully,

  • Ability to prioritize and manage multiple milestones and projects efficiently.

Perks and Benefits

We are here to work hard and deliver the best products in the space. You will have everything you need to build it with us:

  • Flexible working hours

  • Solid compensation package

  • Fully remote work or comfortable office

  • Fully covered participation in conferences and travel expenses

  • Occasional team building events

  • Vacation days well above the industry average
